title.rendered: Offroad Animal Scout Roof Rack to suit Toyota Prado 150 Series 2009 – current

content.rendered:
Scout Roof Rack to suit Toyota Prado 150 Series 2009 – Current

While there are lots of roof racks out there on the market, they all suffer a few problems that the Offroad Animal rack solves.  1. This rack is super quiet, and 2. This rack is not a universal rack but is actually designed specific so it looks great.   Stop putting up with loud racks that don’t look right on your Prado.  Pick up an Offroad Animal Scout Rack and be the envy of all your mates and you’re Mrs will be happy too with how quiet it is.

Benefits

  • Super Quiet design
  • Light weight  aluminium design
  • Very versatile with T-Slot slats
  • Looks the best on the market
  • Easy to put together
  • Low profile for better wind resistance
  • Optional wind deflector that holds 42″ LED light bar
  • Super low profile, only adds 90mm to height of vehicle

Features

  • Supplied with 7x T slot aluminium rails that can quickly and easily fit standard M8 nuts to secure gear anywhere
  • Works with many aftermarket accessories
  • Optional Wind-deflector can be purchased which integrates a 42″ light bar
  • Powder coated matte black
  • Rated to 120kg driving and 240kg sitting still- Rack weight is 26kg Offroad driving this rack is rated to 54kg of cargo.
  • Optional Light bar Wind Deflector holds single or double row light bar up to 42″
  • The rack measures 2035mm long and 1160mm wide overall.

Weight:26 KG

 

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your Nissan Patrol!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
